name: kvm-switcher
title: KVM Switcher
description: KVM switcher for MacOS for displays with built-in KVM and DCCI support. Supports monitor with HDMI, DisplayPort, and Type-C (DisplayPort) (i.e. MSI Modern Series monitors)
author: farizio_kautsar

commands.name: switch-to-dp
commands.title: Switch Monitor to DP
commands.subtitle: KVM Switch to DisplayPort
commands.description: Switching monitor to input to DisplayPort

commands.name: switch-to-hdmi
commands.title: Switch Monitor to HDMI
commands.subtitle: KVM Switch to HDMI
commands.description: Switching monitor to input to HDMI

commands.name: switch-to-type-c
commands.title: Switch Monitor to Type-C
commands.subtitle: KVM Switch to Type-C
commands.description: Switching monitor to input to Type-C

commands.name: switch-to-custom
commands.title: Switch to Custom Input
commands.description: Switch to a user-defined DDC input code.

preferences.name: customCode
preferences.title: DDC Input Code
preferences.description: Enter the numeric code for your desired input (e.g., 15, 16, 17)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
